In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels there is a steward of the Night's Watch named Donnel Hill, nicknamed "Sweet Donnel Hill". He claims to be a [[bastard]] of [[House Lannister]].

While the [[Great Ranging|ranging]] force camps at the [[Fist of the First Men]], Donnel is among the brothers who plot to murder [[Jeor Mormont]], [[Sam]] and more brothers and desert. The sudden snowfall and the [[Battle of the Fist of the First Men|attack of the Others]] foils the plan. However, during the [[Mutiny at Craster's Keep]] DonnelÂ sides with those who are loyal to Mormont. He and the other Loyalists make it to [[Castle Black]] long before [[Jon]] and [[Sam]]. He survives the [[Battle of Castle Black]].
